entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain in the evening then to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
